backend/main.mo: Defines challenge, profile, and authorization logic, including creating challenges, managing participants, and retrieving user state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling initialization, auth state, challenge status, screen routing, and URL sync.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing a centered container with language switcher and scrollable content.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button integrating Internet Identity with translated text and state handling.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer diagnostic panel showing auth data and tools to refresh challenge state.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two translated info popups using SharedPopup for social contemplation and challenge details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Provides a dropdown menu to display and switch between available app languages.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wraps query results to show loading, error with retry, or render children when data is ready.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Displays live recording feedback including mic pulse, timer, audio level meter, and reassurance text.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper that applies consistent styling, scrolling, and RTL support for popup content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Manages microphone recording, audio-level analysis, timers, errors, and blob creation with proper cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication state and principal string derived from the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Dfinity Internet Identity, handling login, state, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge status, and active challenge IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Defines a React Query hook to fetch the user's challenge status from the backend.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty placeholder file for future i18n setup.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Implements an i18n provider with language storage, translation lookup, and direction handling.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Empty index file for i18n module exports.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains full translation dictionaries for multiple languages used throughout the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode, and RTL/LTR handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Renders the landing screen with translations, feature descriptions, and login CTA.
Displays placeholder UI for authenticated users without a challenge and handles auto-redeeming invitation codes.
Large placeholder screen for creating and managing challenges, handling invitation codes, participant management, and start dates via multiple queries and mutations.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty file with no implemented content.
UI placeholder showing challenge overview, edit button, info popups, and basic state text.
Main in‑challenge screen handling tabs, day navigation, participant selection, audio recording, playback, and URL-synced state.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing navigation state parameters in the URL without a router.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 5 daily assignments for the 7‑day challenge, including full text content.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Persists and retrieves the active challenge ID in sessionStorage for restoring context across refreshes.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index to produce readable date labels.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears invitation links using URL parameters while preserving other state tokens.
Cleans and maps backend error messages to user-friendly versions and detects 'challenge not found' errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear values from session or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, schema version, and summarizes existing backend and frontend features for the Social Contemplation ICP dapp.
